title: Ultimate chocolate and hazelnut cupcakes
ingredients: ['100g 70% chocolate', '6 tablespoons milk (semi-skimmed is fine)', '175g unsalted butter', '175g caster sugar', '4 large eggs', '150g self-raising flour', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '100g crushed hazelnuts', 'For the frosting', '120g 70% chocolate', '150g unsalted butter', '160g icing sugar', '1/2 vanilla pod']
